titles.title: A bill to authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs at Denver, Colorado.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1523)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
2/1/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project for a replacement facility for the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Denver, Colorado.
